vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman(?) of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.19; whose brother was Naham (H5163); married to Ishbah (H3431)(?)
§ Hodiah = "majesty of Jehovah"
one of the two wives of Ezra, a man of Judah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
荷第雅 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華的威榮"
一名猶大支派的人 (代上 4:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
荷第雅 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华的威荣"
一名犹大支派的人 (代上 4:19)
